title: Cybernetics Within Us
description: When planes mysteriously start crashing, the world’s governments have to come together to create a means to recognize the cause and put an end to it. But this has happened before, the problem is no one remembers.It all started with the awakening of something long dead, and now it wants to destroy the world...again. Someone will have to stop it, if they can survive it.…A professor that wants to save the world…A tablet that wants to destroy the world…A young girl on the brink of a massive nervous breakdown…And a man possessing secret knowledge lying in a coma for ten years…There is only one villain and it seeks to destroy everythingThe future is the final goal…
author: Nmesoma Okechukwu
